      • loginRest

        @RequestMapping(value="/login-rest",
                method=POST)
public AccountRestModel loginRest(@RequestParam(value="email")
                                                                                                      java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="password")
                                                                                                      java.lang.String password,
                                                                                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        confirms if you can log in
        Parameters:
        email - : The email which you use to log in
        password - : The password from the account
        response - : The response from the server
        Returns:
        The AccountRestModel that the javascript will use to validate the login

      • settingsRest

        @RequestMapping(value="/settings-rest",
                method=POST)
public SettingsRestModel settingsRest(@RequestParam(value="name")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="email")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="oldPassword")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String oldPassword,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="newPassword")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String newPassword,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="newPasswordRepeat")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String newPasswordRepeat,
                                                                                                             @CookieValue(value="ACC_SESSION")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String accountCookie)
        Changing your account variables
        Parameters:
        name - : The username from the user
        email - : The email from the user
        oldPassword - : The old password for if you want to change your password
        newPassword - : The new password
        newPasswordRepeat - : The new password once again for confirmation
        accountCookie - : The current cookie where you can get the account from
        Returns:
